Multiplication

Finding the product of two two-digit numbers

This is the sandbox site for an interactive arithmetic tool that helps learners with various arithmetic operations. The first tool helps learners understand the steps in multiple two two-digit numbers. This is via the regular method and the block (grid) method.

The following videos show regular, grid and line methods of multiplication.
